website_summaries.verdict: This versatile carrier fits babies 7 to 45 lb. without additional accessories required and gives you 3 carrying options.
pros: Babies can be faced inward or (from 6 months) carried on your back or hip
Comfy neck support and tuck-away hood
Straps are well-padded for your comfort

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we live in Texas and all the other carriers were way too hot for our little one. This one is great! Both mom and baby stay cool and comfortable. My baby usually falls asleep in this! Im not sure how to nurse in it as its a little cumbersome....I just take him out to nurse because its easier. I am a smaller frame so the shoulder straps took some adjusting but we got it to fit!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B.

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to use / Kills your back
customer_reviews.text: It’s almost impossible to put this thing on without someone’s help - the clip on the back is so hard to reach. If you have bad posture or a bad back, this will be miserable for you to use. And no, you can not do household chores with this thing on - even sitting to fold laundry is difficult and good luck reaching down into a washing machine without squishing your baby. Don’t buy the infant insert - Amazon recommends it for some reason but it’s not needed on this version so we wasted $40.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyones body type!
customer_reviews.text: This is not for small framed people! The shoulder straps are huge and fall off my shoulders easily. My 1 month old could not ride safely in it because this carrier is too large for a small infant. He just flops aroynd in it when Im in motion. Also after 30 minutes of carrying baby in it, my back starts hurting. Baby cannot face outward either!
customer_reviews.author: DisneyFan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fast!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! I have the standard or go with the insert and I jumped on this style because I hated dealing with the insert for my first kid! I really wish I had it for my first baby. I got the mesh carrier because I had a summer baby. I think that it helped a little but regardless when you have a baby on you, you get hot and sweat on each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier. Comfier than original.
customer_reviews.text: Will update after extended use. We had an older version of the original and wore it into the ground. This one is absolutely more comfortable. Padding in shoulders is very supportive, and nice shape to the back. We like the mesh to keep everyone from getting all sweaty, which happened enough for us to seek a change with the original. We bought one for 60$ through amazon warehouse. The price is high without a discount, but we use it everyday and wouldn’t go without even if we’d had to have paid the full 140$.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I like the mesh because we live in Texas so we need breathable material. But it’s still hot. I wish I had gotten the 360 one though bc my LO LOVES to face out and that’s not an option with this. The reason I didn’t get the Ergo 360? was bc it was Velcro. And for some reason I thought I’d have to unvelcro a sleeping baby from it. But my baby never fell asleep or woke once I was taking him out. So. I like it but I’d go for the 360 next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ph

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I've used it with my 10-day old new born twice now. Easy to put on for both myself and my wife, sturdy material, feels secure for the baby and the baby's head with the infant insert, and he loves being snuggled in it. He stayed sound asleep when we take him around in it. Great purchase, we hope it'll last us for the next 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: gregory gans

customer_reviews.title: Geeat Great Great!
customer_reviews.text: Dad here. This carrier is flippin great! I love having both hands free and my kid loves sleeping and going for walks in it. Keep in mind that for newborns you need to buy the padded insert. Alternatively, you can do what I did - fold a baby blanket into a 6-7" "booster cushion". This way the baby is comfortable and you always have a spare blanket (JIC). You can also use two thinner blankets, just as long as there's about 6" of coushion. Regardless, buy this harness, it is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Rome

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic carrier
customer_reviews.text: I use this carrier every single day and I love it. I honestly didn't expect to wear it as much as I do when I bought it but my baby loves to be held all. the. time. Honestly she doesn't love it as much as she does the wraps but she doesn't dislike it either. The wraps are annoying to get on, especially anywhere in public, then they stretch out during use and you have to keep readjusting and you can't back carry. This is super easy to use and adjust plus the back carry option is nothing short of amazing. My back never hurts from using this. Great buy. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Collom

customer_reviews.title: A big regret
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrier because of all the positive reviews but it’s so uncomfortable for me and baby. I’m 5’2 and muscular but this thing is huge The mesh is painfully scratchy and not soft for newborn skin at all. The seat in extremely wide for a newborn my baby is long and more narrow and on the smallest placement his legs are so spread and uncomfortable Reaching for the buckles is a mission He feels like he’s going to fall out of the side Because of the pandemic we rushed to unpack this before leaving our apartment otherwise tmi would have returned it immediately
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: this is by far my favorite since it’s the easiest and most secure when I’ve ...
customer_reviews.text: After you’re ordering several different types of baby carriers and wraps, this is by far my favorite since it’s the easiest and most secure when I’ve tried. I Mabel to put my two-month-old in by myself and he feels secure and comfortable. I also put him in it when he was about a month old also and it was great for when he was tiny as well. Love that it doesn’t require the newborn insert
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very handy but still hot
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier. I like that I don't need an additional infant insert which would have made just for additional fabric and padding. However, even though it's the cool mesh, it's still very hot and my baby and I sweat on walks. I ordered the black but doubt the silver color would make it any cooler.
customer_reviews.author: EVL

customer_reviews.title: Great product to grow with your baby
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for my newborn and have loved how sturdy this feels. We had an ergobaby carrier for our older kids when they were babies but this one is way more updated. Really enjoy not having the loud Velcro waistband (especially when trying to take it off your waist around your sleeping baby). The adjustable interior is awesome too so you don’t have to buy a separate insert.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfamily

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I finally got an Ergobaby with my 4th baby - and I wish I would've gotten one with the other kids. This is wonderful. It is comfortable and adjustable from 8lbs up. Such a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day earlier than expected! A bit confusing to get on at first but all it took was practice! I have a newborn so I’ve only used one setting, the front facing infant. It was great! I could wrangle my two year old while keeping an eye on the four year old while they played. It is very comfortable. I got hot and sweaty but just where the baby was resting against my chest. I can’t wait to use it more as we go places and even around the house to get things done! Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bartoli

customer_reviews.title: Love it but wish it were forward facing
customer_reviews.text: Loved this carrier when my little guy was a newborn, it’s a great carrier for the money but I ended up getting the 360 because this one doesn’t do forward facing.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but my baby didn’t love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause a lot of moms talked about this brand and the M position of baby’s But unfortunately my baby didn’t love to be carried So it was a lost of money But came as was describe
customer_reviews.author: Julia Avila

customer_reviews.title: but I can’t use it comfortably even though I have tightened all the belts almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually this baby carrier was too big for me. I’m 5’4, size 6, so I don’t think I’m too smaller or too thinner than average, but I can’t use it comfortably even though I have tightened all the belts almost all the way, weights and shoulders, still it’s too loose. I didn’t know how does it fit with a body like I have, I wouldn’t have bought if I knew that. Product itself is good, but it needs better size chart or explanations in the instruction section.
customer_reviews.author: Asako H.

customer_reviews.title: Safe, secure, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It may be more expensive than other products but it is by far the most comfortable we’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: PSM

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike about this product is that it takes two ppl to put it on . It’s bulky and it only has 3 positions and not are front facing for baby . For the price tag I would expect more , in my opinion it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Yzamara Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is extremely difficult to put on and maneuver with baby in your arms. Very clunky and not a good fit for someone with a small frame. Returning as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, low profile and breathable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier, we also have the Ergo 360 from our first baby but ordered this for the summer months with our second since the 360 was getting too hot. So easy to wear and put on. It’s low profile and I love that you don’t need the infant insert. Works well for our 4 week old and use it everyday. She is comfortable and falls asleep in it quickly. Much cooler with the mesh fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Travis P.

customer_reviews.title: Great baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: I’m 4’10” so I wasn’t sure how this was going to fit me, but it has straps to adjust to your shoulders and hips. It also has a clip for your back so you can secure it. I was a little worried that my 16 pound 2 month old was going to break my back. Lol. But as soon as I put him in it, it was super comfortable. I never thought I’d be the mom that would wear my baby, but here we are and I’ll definitely keep using it. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nayeli R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to use, best baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier so much. I’ve had different kinds of carriers and this is my favorite one. Very comfortable for me and the baby. My son always fall asleep so fast in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me. It was very hot for one thing. We live in ga where the humidity is unreal. Second, the straps around my waist were so uncomfortable! I ended up returning this and keeping my infantino 18.00 carrier because it wasn’t as hot or complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to carry my grandson around in it. She loved it because the item is "breatheable", and that's important due to my grandson developing heat rashes so easily.
customer_reviews.author: KLP63

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bigger dads
customer_reviews.text: I searched for awhile to find a carrier that would fit my husband. He's 6'4" 260lbs, this fits with plenty of room to spare, very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kcox

customer_reviews.title: I love this carrier
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier! My 9-pound baby fits in it well and she always falls asleep . I love being able to do things hands-free, this is such a life saver! I also like that it has cool air mesh, we live where it's very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't handle life as a mother of 3 with a job without this carrier. I "wear" my baby everywhere in my busy life and this carrier is by far the most comfortable I've ever had! Easy to adjust, lightweight, clean easily. LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: rf1

customer_reviews.title: This product is durable but not front facing
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old baby strongly dislikes this carrier. I've read the instructions to ensure that she is secure and as comfortable as possible. However, I find that the carrier rubs on her thighs a bit and most of all she hates that she can't see her surroundings while in it. I have never been able to keep her in it or use it outside of my home because she bawls every time I've put her in it. It's a real shame because the product seems durable and it was expensive. I would love to return it in exchange for a front facing carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Ceara Hart

customer_reviews.title: Absolute perfect for comfort and hands free around the house.
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I expected and I couldn't have asked for a better baby backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew clopton

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was not very comfortable. Returned this for the 4 position carrier and am much happier with my purchase. Baby is happier too!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really love this baby carrier. I use it multiple times a day so that I can walk my dog. It’s super easy to use and very convenient. The reason I give it 4 stars is because mine seems to be a bit pop sided. One of my son’s legs sticks out a bit more and at a funny angle on my right side. Also, I’m not sure how good it is for his circulation, so I’m careful to not use it for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea I

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this. I use it for my newborn and it’s perfect when we go out. It keeps her close (away from germy hands) and coo
customer_reviews.author: Jaime C

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: life saver when my baby doesn’t want to be alone. I just wear it and walk around the house. The mesh is great and fresh. Washed it in the washer a few times and it looks still new! I wore it since my baby was 1 month old (big baby) and he was sleeping soundly.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my new born
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my newborn came use it until he's maybe 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: MsGirly

customer_reviews.title: I love this carrier! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier! It's well made, comfy for me and my baby, easy to use, durable, love the card/phone pocket on the waist strap! Everything about it is exactly what I wanted. Highly recommend, well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is a serious must have! I use it all of the time and helps me get things done and be close to my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Colt Replogle

customer_reviews.title: No front-facing baby.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought this was front-facing. By the time I found it, it was after my return date.
customer_reviews.author: Quang

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's a good carrier, but you need a new born insert for smaller babies.
customer_reviews.author: Anne D

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier for new baby
customer_reviews.text: Daughter researched all carriers and picked this one. She is happy
customer_reviews.author: HUBBABUBBA1

customer_reviews.title: Love ergo!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my ergo! Second one and breathes so amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Creative Games

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I had infantino carrier and my son would scream so much that I never was able to use it. Once u bought this he seem so happy and even slept in it. It is also more comfortable for me and the lumbar support is amazing considering after birth back pain and a big baby. Worth every penny !!!
customer_reviews.author: ivette c

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it to everyone! Baby loves it. Very easy to use. Has great back support for the parent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 1/4 of the price and it’s perfect! Gift for brother and sis in law and my new niece!
customer_reviews.author: Denni Rose Stylist- Christie

customer_reviews.title: so light weight and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: so light weight and easy to put on! As a single mother it's really important to have a baby carrier that requires little to no help when I am on the go and this is perfect. my little girl is 2 months and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaynessa Mejorado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and fit for my 7lb
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaving! Perfect size and fit for my 7lb. Both me and my husband (its super easy to adjust) are a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Easy baby insert and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ergobaby carrier. Bet carrier out of the three that I have. It’s easy to snap the baby in and go.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Fits us wide mommas just fine!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and excited to use it! I was worried we wouldn't find a carrier that would be small enough to fit my husband, but could be adjusted to fit around my wide hips/bust. This fit the bill perfectly! Came highly recommended to me by multiple people!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gall

customer_reviews.title: great, comfortable a bit bulky compared to the ergo classic or embrace carrier.
customer_reviews.text: great, comfortable a bit bulky compared to the ergo classic or embrace carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: saved my day
customer_reviews.text: my baby and I love it, she falls a sleep in a minute it is so comfortable to both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Dafna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for both me and the baby. Stays much cooler than my other ergo. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: all's good. Can see that ergobaby gives good quality products
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for a friend. I did open up and check, all's good. Can see that ergobaby gives good quality products. Hope my god daughter will like it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits perfectly on me and super comfortable and breathable
customer_reviews.author: Nor

customer_reviews.title: There's a hole on the hoodie.
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived yesterday. Everything looked perfect except for the hole on the hoodie. It is small but noticeable. Thinking of returning or exchanging but it's a hassle when you have a busy schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W. Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointing and major let down!
customer_reviews.text: For the price to be this high and it be this bad of a BABY CARRIER is sad and reckless.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Van Peenen

product_meta.title: Ergobaby Baby Carrier Adapt Infant to Toddler Carrier with Cool Air Mesh, Pearl Grey
product_meta.description: Color:Pearl GreyThe Ergobaby Adapt is the traditional carrier that allows you to bond with baby as they grow. This three position carrier (front inward, hip & back) is great for people not looking for outward carrying options. The Adapt ergonimically grows with baby from newborn to toddler (0-48months; 7-45lbs). The 100% cotton fabric is soft and cozy for the ultimate in plush comfort. With padded lumbar support and extra-cushioned crossable shoulder straps, the Adapt Carrier gives you and your baby amazing all day comfort. Includes UPF baby hood for sun protection, privacy and easy breastfeeding. Ergobaby stands by our products with our ErgoPromise Guarantee. If you find a manufacturing or material defect, Ergobaby will replace your carrier at no charge. Most Adapt Carriers are also eligible for the Everlove by Ergobaby Carrier Buyback program.
feature_bullets: BOND WITH BABY AS THEY GROW: Award Winning design keeps baby close from newborn to toddler (0-48 Months; 7-45lbs).
3 CARRY POSITIONS: Front Inward, Hip & Back Carry
100% PREMIUM COTTON: Soft and cozy for the ultimate in comfort
COMFORT: Padded lumbar back support and extra padded shoulder straps. Can be used in two ways: regular or crossed shoulder straps
ERGONOMIC AS BABY GROWS: Acknowledged as hip healthy by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute.
ERGOPROMISE: If you find a manufacturing or material defect, Ergobaby will replace your carrier or part at no charge.

FILL HEARTS, NOT LANDFILLS: Everlove by Ergobaby is a first of its kind baby carrier buyback and restoration program. Ergobaby buys back your previously loved Ergobaby carriers and breathes new life into them for new families to enjoy.
PREMIUM FEATURES: UPF baby hood for sun protection and privacy for easy breastfeeding. Machine Washable.
